Name: Average time from 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' to 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Average time between 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Total time from 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' to 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' across all cases
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Average time for completion of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' after 'SW-Reviewer Selection is now due'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Selection is now due' and activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2'

Name: Total resolution time of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' in the review process
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 and the end of the case

Name: Minimum time between 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Average time to 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' after 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Time from 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' to 'Assign a Different Editor' in cases where reviewers decline
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'Assign a Different Editor'

Name: Average time for 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' in cases leading to 'SW-EIC Major Revision'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-EIC Major Revision'

Name: Minimum resolution time of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' in cases of successful reviewer agreement
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Elapsed time between 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' to measure effectiveness of reminders
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1'

Name: Average time from 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' to 'SW-Reviewer Declined' to understand decline rates post-reminder
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined'

Name: Total time from 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' to 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' to gauge the impact on decision-making timeline
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Time of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' cycle from sending to receiving a response from the reviewer
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'
